meanings.definition: To express great joy or happiness.
meanings.sent1: The children were jubilating after receiving their presents.
meanings.sent2: The crowd was jubilating at the victory of their team.
meanings.sent3: The puppy was jubilating with wagging tail and playful barks.
meanings.sent4: The flowers in the garden seemed to be jubilating under the warm sun.
meanings.sent5: The students were jubilating so loudly that the whole school could hear their happiness.

meanings.sent1: The community was jubilating the annual festival with music and dance.
meanings.sent2: The family was jubilating the graduation of their daughter with a big party.
meanings.sent3: The cat was jubilating by chasing a butterfly around the garden.
meanings.sent4: The stars in the night sky were jubilating in their twinkling dance.
meanings.sent5: The town was jubilating the arrival of spring with colorful decorations and parades.
